# PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Blending.opaque

**Case**

An opaque surface.

## Declaration

```swift
case opaque
```

## Specifying opacity

- **PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Blending.transparent(opacity:)**: A surface that’s transparent.
- **opacityThreshold**: A threshold below which RealityKit ignores opacity.
- **PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Opacity**: An object that defines the opacity of an entity.

items.description: A threshold below which RealityKit ignores opacity.
items.name: opacityThreshold

items.description: An object that defines the opacity of an entity.
